content:
As per usual, some FHIR tech team meetings are scheduled for evening work this week:

  • tues (tonight): IGs, templates, multi-languages
  • wed - nothing after the boat trip
  • thurs - I'll be meeting with Ted about UTG. Anyone else interested in UTG is free to join

However due to our different location etc, the details are a bit different. Tonight will be at my airbnb. If you would like to come, let me know privately (message etc) and we'll talk details. Thurs will probably be the same.

@Ted Klein @Jose Costa Teixeira @Giorgio Cangioli

Convention 3.3 - FHIR-I 5:30-7:00 - RG?, GG

Tooling plans

@Brian Postlethwaite

After the co-chairs? At same time as steering div?
With 1/2 our co-chairs out kinda need to go to that :oh_no:
if you're still interested, let me know, we're just getting started...
